com.topcoder.shared.netCommon
Class CSHandler

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.topcoder.shared.netCommon.CSHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
CSReader, CSWriter
public abstract class CSHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements CSReader, CSWriter

The default CSReader and CSWriter implementation. This class is designed for inheritance. You may want to subclass it if you want to send/recv your custom classes but you cannot or do not want to change CSHandler.

Author:
Timur Zambalayev

          Constructs a new custom serialization handler.

customWriteObject

protected final void customWriteObject(java.lang.Object object)
                                throws java.io.IOException
A convenience method for writing CustomSerializable instances.
Parameters:
object - the object to be written, it should be a CustomSerializable instance.

writeObjectOverride

protected abstract boolean writeObjectOverride(java.lang.Object object)
                                        throws java.io.IOException
This method should be used by subclasses to write their custom types.
Parameters:
object - the object to be written.
Returns:
true if object is processed, false otherwise.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if an I/O error has occurred.

readObjectOverride

protected java.lang.Object readObjectOverride(byte type)
                                       throws java.io.IOException
This method should be used by subclasses to read their custom types. It is called only after CSHandler was not able to process this type.
Parameters:
type - byte value representing the type of the object.
Returns:
the object read.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if an I/O error has occurred.
